<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

=Installation Requirements=
  * [http://www.python.org/download/ Python 2.x]
  * [http://www.pygtk.org/downloads.html PyGTK 2.x]

=Using tintwizard=
==What does _option_ do?==
Please read the [http://code.google.com/p/tint2/wiki/Configure tint2 configuration guide] for in depth information on what everything does.

==How do I use my config?==
{{{
tint2 -c PATH_TO_CONFIG_FILE
}}}

==How do I replace the default config?==
Navigate to _$HOME/.config/tint2_ and replace the file _tint2rc_ with your config file.

==How do I suggest new features?==
If you would like to suggest a new feature for tintwizard, please file a [http://code.google.com/p/tintwizard/issues/entry feature request].

==How do I report bugs?==
File bugs [http://code.google.com/p/tintwizard/issues/entry here]. Thank you for your support by reporting bugs.
